content: crochet healing stitches xl afghan is really just a bigger version of the original healing stitches afghan i wanted to crochet a blanket that would be big enough for two people to share and cuddle together under and enjoy this version adds another 10″ to make is a really nice 68″ square i have a few weddings coming up this year and needed to get busy on some gifts i really think this will be a great present for the newlyweds
